set(third_party_folder "ThirdParty")

set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

if(NOT TARGET glfw)
    option(GLFW_BUILD_DOCS "" OFF)
    option(GLFW_INSTALL "" OFF)
    add_subdirectory(glfw)
    set_target_properties(glfw PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glfw)
    set_target_properties(update_mappings PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glfw)
endif()

if (NOT TARGET glm)
    add_subdirectory(glm)
    set_target_properties(glm PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glm)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET imgui)
    include(imgui.cmake)
    set_target_properties(imgui PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/imgui)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET rttr_core_lib)
    option(BUILD_RTTR_DYNAMIC "" OFF)
    option(BUILD_UNIT_TESTS "" OFF)
    option(BUILD_STATIC "Build RTTR as static library" ON)
    option(BUILD_EXAMPLES "" OFF)
    option(BUILD_DOCUMENTATION "" OFF)
    option(BUILD_INSTALLER "" OFF)
    option(BUILD_PACKAGE "" OFF)
    option(CUSTOM_DOXYGEN_STYLE "" OFF)
    add_subdirectory(rttr)
    set_target_properties(rttr_core_lib PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/rttr)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET spdlog)
    add_subdirectory(spdlog)
    set_target_properties(spdlog PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/spdlog)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET stb)
    include(stb.cmake)
    set_target_properties(stb PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/stb)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET assimp)
    option(ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
    OPTION(ASSIMP_INSTALL "" OFF)
    add_subdirectory(assimp)
    set_target_properties(assimp PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/assimp)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET VulkanMemoryAllocator)
    add_subdirectory(VulkanMemoryAllocator)
    set_target_properties(VulkanMemoryAllocator PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/VulkanMemoryAllocator)
endif()
